Title: Content Injection via TileJSON attribute
Description: Mapbox.js is vulnerable to a cross-site-scripting attack in certain uncommon usage scenarios.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 1.6.5, all versions starting from 2.0.0-beta0 before 2.1.7
Solution: Upgrade to Mapbox.js version 2.1.7. If you are still using a 1.x version and unable to upgrade to 2.1.7, upgrade to 1.6.5.
